title: List of all Android annotations support  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android annotations support  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: command-lib
repoList.description: Java library for Command Design Pattern, support code generation by Annotation Processing, compatible with Android

repoList.name: gsonpath-extensions
repoList.description: An extension library for Gsonpath that adds Android Support Library annotation client-side validation

repoList.name: mori-router
repoList.description: Annotation based Android router library. (with Shared Element support)

repoList.name: test-support-annotations
repoList.description: android test code for support-annotations library

repoList.name: AndroidActiveAnnotation
repoList.description: A library inspired by Android Annotation and Xtendroid, using Xtend Active Annotation and Android official Databinding library, and Android Support libraries, Alibaba FastJSON, GreenRobot EventBus, Glide, to build a android bootstrap library.

repoList.name: Broker
repoList.description: Annotation Processing Library for Android Supporting Implementation of the Repository Pattern
